net.minecraftforge.fluids

Class FluidEvent.FluidDrainingEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • cpw.mods.fml.common.eventhandler.Event
      • net.minecraftforge.fluids.FluidEvent
        • net.minecraftforge.fluids.FluidEvent.FluidDrainingEvent
  • Enclosing class:
    FluidEvent

    public static class FluidEvent.FluidDrainingEvent
extends FluidEvent
    Mods should fire this event when a fluid is IFluidTank.drain(int, boolean) from their tank.
